languages.text: Несколько корабельных дней вы наблюдали за тем, как во время пересменки охрана покидает свои посты, уходит на обед, сменяется, играет в регицид и возвращается с попоек. На четвертый день, во время пересменки, вы незаметно пробираетесь в небольшую комнатку и обнаруживаете оставленный вокс-передатчик.

traits.locale_text: Несколько корабельных дней вы наблюдали за тем, как во время пересменки охрана покидает свои посты, уходит на обед, сменяется, играет в регицид и возвращается с попоек. На четвертый день, во время пересменки, вы незаметно пробираетесь в небольшую комнатку и обнаруживаете оставленный вокс-передатчик.

languages.text: You have been studying the enforcers for several days now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.
languages.original_text: Несколько корабельных дней вы наблюдали за тем, как во время пересменки охрана покидает свои посты, уходит на обед, сменяется, играет в регицид и возвращается с попоек. На четвертый день, во время пересменки, вы незаметно пробираетесь в небольшую комнатку и обнаруживаете оставленный вокс-передатчик.

traits.locale_text: For several ship days, you've been observing the guards during shift change. The way they leave their posts, go to the mess, take over from each other, play regicide, and return from drinking parties. On the fourth day, during shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox transmitter someone left behind.

For several ship days, you've been observing the guards during shift change. The way they leave their posts, go to the mess, take over from each other, play regicide, and return from drinking parties. On the fourth day, during shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox transmitter someone left behind.

For several ship days, you've been observing the guards during shift change. The way they leave their posts, go to the mess, take over from each other, play regicide, and return from drinking parties. On the fourth day, during shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox transmitter someone left behind.

The Rogue Trader has been studying the enforcers for several cycles now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, {mf|he|she} sneaks into their small room and finds a vox-caster that someone left behind.

The Rogue Trader has been studying the enforcers for several cycles now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, {mf|he|she} sneaks into their small room and finds a vox-caster that someone left behind.

You have been studying the enforcers for several cycles now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.

languages.text: 你观察了执法者好几天，仔细观察他们换班、去食堂吃饭、玩弑君棋，以及酩酊大醉的规律。到了第四天，在某次换班之后，你潜入了他们的小房间，找到了某个人遗落下来的通讯器。
languages.original_text: You have been studying the enforcers for several days now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.

traits.locale_text: 你观察了执法者好几天，仔细观察他们换班、去食堂吃饭、玩弑君棋，以及酩酊大醉的规律。到了第四天，在某次换班之后，你潜入了他们的小房间，找到了某个人遗落下来的通讯器。

languages.text: Has estado estudiando a los guardias durante varios días, fijándote en sus cambios de turno, visitas a la cantina, partidas de regicidio y las consecuencias de la bebida. El cuarto día, durante un cambio de turno, te cuelas en su pequeña sala y encuentras un voco amplificador abandonado.
languages.original_text: You have been studying the enforcers for several days now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.

traits.locale_text: Has estado estudiando a los guardias durante varios días, fijándote en sus cambios de turno, visitas a la cantina, partidas de regicidio y las consecuencias de la bebida. El cuarto día, durante un cambio de turno, te cuelas en su pequeña sala y encuentras un voco amplificador abandonado.

languages.text: あなたは、執行官の当番のタイミング、食堂への移動時、レジサイドのゲームをするさまや酒宴の後など、何回かのパターンを観察してきた。4日目、当番交代のタイミングでローグトレーダーは狭い部屋に忍び込み、誰かが置き忘れた音声通信（ヴォクス）送受信装置を見つける。
languages.original_text: You have been studying the enforcers for several days now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、執行官の当番のタイミング、食堂への移動時、レジサイドのゲームをするさまや酒宴の後など、何回かのパターンを観察してきた。4日目、当番交代のタイミングでローグトレーダーは狭い部屋に忍び込み、誰かが置き忘れた音声通信（ヴォクス）送受信装置を見つける。

languages.text: Du studierst die Enforcer nun schon seit einigen Zyklen, verfolgst ihre Schichtwechsel, ihre Ausflüge in die Kantine, ihre Königsmord-Spiele und die Folgen ihrer Saufgelage. Am vierten Tag schleichst du dich während eines Schichtwechsels in ihre kleine Kammer und findest einen zurückgelassenen Vox-Transmitter.
languages.original_text: You have been studying the enforcers for several days now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.

traits.locale_text: Du studierst die Enforcer nun schon seit einigen Zyklen, verfolgst ihre Schichtwechsel, ihre Ausflüge in die Kantine, ihre Königsmord-Spiele und die Folgen ihrer Saufgelage. Am vierten Tag schleichst du dich während eines Schichtwechsels in ihre kleine Kammer und findest einen zurückgelassenen Vox-Transmitter.

Seit mehreren Zyklen studiert {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Enforcers jetzt schon, beobachtet ihre Schichtwechsel, ihre Ausflüge in die Kantine, ihre Königsmord-Spiele und die Folgen ihrer Saufgelage. Am vierten Tag, während eines Schichtwechsels, schleicht {mf|er|sie} sich in ihre kleine Kammer und findet einen Vox-Transmitter, den jemand zurückgelassen hat.

languages.text: Vous avez étudié les habitudes des prévots pendant plusieurs jours, observant les relèves de garde, les allées et venues au mess, les parties de régicide et les inévitables gueules de bois. Le quatrième jour, lors d'une relève de garde, vous vous faufilez dans leur petite pièce et trouvez un émetteur vox que quelqu'un avait oublié là.
languages.original_text: You have been studying the enforcers for several days now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} étudie les habitudes des exécutants pendant plusieurs cycles, observant les relèves de garde, les allées et venues à la messe, les parties de régicide et les éventuelles gueules de bois. Le quatrième jour, lors d'une relève de garde, {mf|il|elle} se faufile dans leur petite pièce et trouve un émetteur vox que quelqu'un avait oublié là.

languages.text: Birkaç gündür infazcıları gözlemliyorsun; vardiya değişimlerini, yemekhaneye gidişlerini, kral katili oyunlarını ve içki seanslarının ardından olanları dikkatle izliyorsun. Dördüncü gün, bir vardiya değişimi sırasında küçük odalarına gizlice giriyor ve birinin geride bıraktığı voksyayarı buluyorsun.
languages.original_text: You have been studying the enforcers for several days now, observing shift changes, trips to the mess, games of regicide, and the aftermath of boozing sessions. On the fourth day, during a shift change, you sneak into their small room and find a vox-caster that someone left behind.

traits.locale_text: Birkaç gündür infazcıları gözlemliyorsun; vardiya değişimlerini, yemekhaneye gidişlerini, kral katili oyunlarını ve içki seanslarının ardından olanları dikkatle izliyorsun. Dördüncü gün, bir vardiya değişimi sırasında küçük odalarına gizlice giriyor ve birinin geride bıraktığı voksyayarı buluyorsun.
